description: A robber who implied he had a weapon held up a downtown Little Rock bank late Tuesday morning, authorities said.
title: Police investigate robbery at Simmons Bank in lobby of downtown Little Rock building
title_page: Police investigate robbery at Simmons Bank in lobby of downtown Little Rock building
text:
Police investigate a bank robbery at Simmons Tower in downtown Little Rock on Tuesday. - Photo by Jeff Mitchell
A robber who implied he had a weapon held up a downtown Little Rock bank late Tuesday morning, authorities said.
Officers were called shortly before 11:30 a.m. to a robbery at the Simmons Bank branch in the lobby of the Simmons Tower at 425 W. Capitol Ave.
The robber left with an undisclosed amount of cash. No injuries were reported.
The robber is described as a black male with a heavyset or medium build who stood about 5 foot 11 inches tall. He was wearing black pants and a gray sweatshirt, and he was said to be about 40 years old.
